title: Knights & Merchants [RUS]
description:
War and peace. =============================================================================== Welcome in heart of the medieval Europe!

It, certainly, not product Thick, but would be pleasant also to it: construction of own cities, desperate sorties on territory of the next princedoms and grandiose fights for capital of the state proceed in this world in parallel with a life of the most usual Ãƒï¿½Ã‚Â¿Ãƒï¿½Ã‚ÂµÃƒï¿½Ã‚ÂºÃƒï¿½Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€˜?Ãƒï¿½Ã‚ÂµÃƒï¿½Ã‚Â¹, foresters, smiths and other citizens.
Last twenty years the life of your kingdom proceeded as well as possible - respectable farmers collected rich crops, foresters landed shady groves, Ãƒï¿½Ã‚Â¿Ãƒï¿½Ã‚ÂµÃƒï¿½Ã‚ÂºÃƒï¿½Ã‚Â°Ãƒâ€˜?Ãƒï¿½Ã‚Â¸ and wine makers competed in art of preparation of the refined delicacies, and knights palace guards even have a little grown fat from long absence of practice.
However prince Lotar, the favourite of queen and the heir-at-law of king Charles, has decided to not wait for the hour to ascend to a throne and force has grasped a southern province of the state, having untied severe civil war. The small handful of the oldest barons has remained is true to Charles, however the set of lungs on a profit of deputies has quickly gone over on the party of the impostor counting upon the new grounds and gold chests of royal treasury, and after ten days to enemies it was possible to besiege Charles in its own fortress.
Now all hope lays only on you - the true chief palace guards and the best friend to king. During twenty missions you should pass a hard way from protection of small small town in the north of kingdom before epic fight for capital, developing economy and being improved in tactics.

So, in your hands - the whole kingdom. Trustworthy alliens and deadly enemies. Cities and armies, knights and farmers. Welcome in heart of the medieval Europe!
